content.c_answer2: Mamma Mia! is currently playing at the Novello Theatre in London's West End. It has been a fixture at the Novello since 2012, following a successful run at the Prince of Wales theatre. The Novello Theatre is easily accessible from Covent Garden tube station and Charing Cross overground train station.
content.name: What theatre is Mamma Mia! in London?
content.question: What theatre is Mamma Mia! in London?
